title: Might of Numenor (3C43)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Tale. Maneuver: Spot a [Gondor] companion to reveal a card at random from an opponent's hand. Heal X companions, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.
Lore:	”'But the lords of Minas Tirith still fight on….'”
Rarity:	C
